title: KORE and Integron Launch Critical Asset Management Solution Based on Sony platform, Ahead of FDA Ruling - Associated Press
description: KORE and Integron Launch Critical Asset Management Solution Based on Sony platform, Ahead of FDA Ruling Associated Press
content:
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Apr 15, 2020--
KORE, the independent global IoT leader, today announced the launch of a new comprehensive managed services solution for Critical Asset Management (CAM), utilizing the Visilion asset tracking platform from Sony Networ… [+4010 chars]
